channel.title: Pi ::item command

item.title: Pi ::item command
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

OK so my ::item command work’s for admin + no madder what right it stay’s at so here’s my code anyone know the problime?

[code]}

	if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
		
					if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			if (c.inWild())
				return;
			try {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			if (args.length == 3) {
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
				if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
					c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					System.out.println("Spawned: " + newItemID + " by: " + c.playerName);
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200");
			}
			} catch (Exception e) {
			
			}[/code]

and one more thing how can i add some item’s to be none spanable so when u try to spawn it it say’s u can spawn this item or something?

Read full topic
